title: Remove secondary hero background image layer

requirements.summary: Remove the Hero parallax background layer that renders /assets/generated/layered-background.dim_1920x1080.jpg so the second top-of-page image no longer appears.
acceptanceCriteria: When loading the homepage, the hero section no longer requests or displays `/assets/generated/layered-background.dim_1920x1080.jpg`.
The remaining hero background layers (celestial pattern, geometric overlay, renaissance sketch overlay, gradients) still render without visual breakage (no empty/blank layer artifacts).

file_operations.description:
Delete the parallax background
/ layer that references `/assets/generated/layered-background.dim_1920x1080.jpg`, ensuring no leftover empty layer, z-index gap, or parallax transform logic remains for that removed layer.

requirements.summary: Delete the unused generated layered-background.dim_1920x1080.jpg static asset from frontend public assets if it exists.
acceptanceCriteria: The file `layered-background.dim_1920x1080.jpg` is removed from the frontend static assets (if it exists).
`npm`/Vite build completes successfully and the site loads without 404s related to the removed asset.

file_operations.description: Remove the static generated image file from frontend public assets (only if present) so it no longer consumes repository/project storage.
